item.title: Final Project
item.description: AR Pop-up Toy AR technology is a bridge between virtual and reality. With the help of AR glasses, it’s possible to see something fantasy. The basic idea of this project is super simple: use a tangible object as a trigger, to make something happen in the virtual world. Araddin Lamp The first idea came into my mind is Araddin Magic Lamp, the famous folk tale in the book One Thousand and One Nights.
